plugins.name: serverless-plugin-external-sns-events
plugins.description: Add ability for functions to use existing or external SNS topics as an event source

plugins.name: serverless-plugin-write-env-vars
plugins.description: Write environment variables out to a file that is compatible with dotenv

plugins.name: serverless-webpack
plugins.description: Serverless plugin to bundle your lambdas with Webpack

plugins.name: serverless-resources-env
plugins.description: After Deploy, this plugin fetches cloudformation resource identifiers and sets them on AWS lambdas, and creates local .<state>-env file

plugins.name: serverless-event-constant-inputs
plugins.description: Allows you to add constant inputs to events in Serverless 1.0. This is defined in https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/simply-serverless-use-constant-values-in-cloudwatch-event-triggered-lambda-functions/
